# 20f-computer-architecture
* 컴퓨터 구조
  * [Course GitHub Repository](https://github.com/snu-csl)
  * [Course Homepage](http://csl.snu.ac.kr/courses/4190.308/2020-2/)
* pyrisc installation
  * `vim ~/.bashrc`
    * `export PATH=/opt/riscv/bin:$PATH`
  * `source ~/.bashrc`
  * `pip install pyelftools`
